data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth @cobuspienaar 
Hi - when I redo the AutoSorter I changed the component reading barcodes.
The Pros using new component was:
Reading of barcodes that were not in correct orientation or sideways or upside down.
Automatic reading of QR codes.
Able to have a Dev and UAT sorter for first time.

Con is that obviously it struggles to read bad quality barcodes( Hasson Amod)

Should I revert back to the old component?
